title: When I click to open my league it shows the logo for a second and the doesnt do anything
body: It just shows the logo and loads for a second then stops. Please help

replies.body:
This can be a common issue when your pc settings don't have the right permissions to access game files. Have a look through our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to make sure the patcher is added as an exception.

Hit me up if you run into any issues or have any other questions!
i have same problem tell me if u got that
